all_questions.question: What type of model does the language model produce?
all_questions.context: the technical device which you can feed with the representation of the full source

all_questions.question: How does the language model propose the next word in a sentence?
all_questions.context: a calculation which takes its previous state, the word it has just produced, and it proposes the next word.

all_questions.question: What is the role of the decoder in the language model process?
all_questions.context: So this is exactly that formula.

all_questions.question: Can you feed the representation of a full source sentence into the decoder, and then step by step produce the target words one at a time?
all_questions.context: and in later stages the source sentence is still there, and you also have the access to all the words that were produced so far.

all_questions.question: What type of device do you give information to the decoder to get the next word?
all_questions.context: and you always give it the information which words of the candidates you have chosen

selected_questions.question: What type of device do you give information to the decoder to get the next word?
